attributes.title: Guru Is Paramashiva Reaching Out To The Universe
attributes.description:
16 FEBRUARY 2020 

*POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM TODAY’S NITHYANANDA (ENGLISH) SATSANG 

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM SHRIKAILASA:

*THE DEEP ANANDA SPURANA OF PARAMASHIVA MEANS, HIS ECSTATIC INHALING AND EXHALING REACHING TO PLANET EARTH - BHUR - HIS OWN EXTENSION, AMSA, MANIFESTATION AND INCARNATION.

*THE ANANDA SPURANA OF PARAMASHIVA, HIS BREATH MOVEMENTS - PRANA, APANA, UDANA, SAMANA, VYANA, HIS BREATHING SPACE REACHING OUT TO THE WHOLE HUMANITY IS BHUR - HIS INCARNATION HAPPENING ON PLANET EARTH. HIS VERY SPACE MANIFESTING HERE ON THE PLANET EARTH IS SHRIKAILASA. 

*THE WAY HE WANTS TO GRACE PLANET EARTH, GRACE HUMANITY, GRACE EACH ONE OF YOUR LIVES, HE DEMONSTRATES HIS COMPASSION BY HAPPENING AS THE GURU, MANIFESTING HIMSELF AS THE ‘INCARNATION’ AND ENTERING YOUR LIFE. RECOGNISING PARAMASHIVA HIMSELF IS ENTERING IN YOUR LIFE AS GURU, IS THE MOST BLESSED THING YOU CAN ACHIEVE ON PLANET EARTH. 

*HE HIMSELF MANIFESTING, ENTERING IN YOUR LIFE AS GURU IS THE MOST BLESSED, BEAUTIFUL, GREATEST HAPPENING AND ACHIEVEMENT FOR YOU IN YOUR LIFE. ANY OTHER AWARD, REWARD, ACHIEVEMENT, WEALTH, POSITION, CAREER, SOCIAL, POLITICAL, ECONOMIC POWERS, RELATIONSHIPS, RESOURCES - IS ALL SECOND PRIORITY. 

*POWER, ENLIGHTENMENT, KNOWLEDGE, EXTREME STRENGTH, ALL THESE GREAT, ULTIMATE, BEAUTIFUL, AUSPICIOUS HAPPENINGS ARE THE SIDE EFFECT OF HIS BREATHING SPACE MANIFESTING IN PLANET EARTH.

*THE FIRST TIME WHEN I STARTED TEACHING, I WAS WONDERING WHAT NAME I SHOULD GIVE FOR THAT CLASS, OR PROGRAM. I WENT INTO SAMADHI AND ASKED PARAMASHIVA: WHAT SHOULD BE THE NAME? HE SHOWED ME CLEARLY WHAT IS ME. I AM JUST THE ANANDA SPURANA OF PARAMASHIVA OVERFLOWING ON PLANET EARTH, REACHING OUT TO THIS UNIVERSE. THEN THAT SHOULD BE THE NAME! 

*NO PROGRAM EVER CAN CROSS THE DEPTH OF ANANDA SPURANA PROGRAM. THAT IS THE PUREST, VIRGIN VERSION OF ME, JUST OUT OF THE BOX! IF YOU HAVE ATTENDED THE FIRST SET OF ANANDA SPURANAS THAT I HAVE PERSONALLY CONDUCTED, YOU ARE BLESSED! I DID AROUND MAYBE 500 ANANDA SPURANAS TOTALLY. THEN I DID VARIOUS OTHER PROGRAMS LIKE THE NITHYANANDA SPURANA. OF COURSE OTHER PROGRAMS ARE NOT LESSER, BUT ANANDA SPURANA HAS ITS OWN UNIQUENESS! FIRST IS FIRST! 

*PARAMASHIVA HIMSELF MANIFESTING HIS OWN BREATHING SPACE, IS GURU. AND MORE AND MORE YOU ALIGN TO GURU AND BE INTEGRATED TO GURU AND GURUVAK, YOU BECOME ENLIGHTENED AND ALL THE SIDE EFFECTS OF PARAMASHIVA - HIS STATE, SPACE, BEING, SUPERCONSCIOUS AND KAILASA, START MANIFESTING AROUND YOU. 

*PARAMASHIVA INHALING AND EXHALING, MANIFESTS HIMSELF SWEETLY, ENTERS INTO YOUR LIFE, SOMETIMES VERY SWIFTLY! YOU JUST DON'T KNOW WHEN HE CAME INTO YOUR HEART AND FILLED YOU! SUDDENLY YOU REALISE: ‘YOU ARE HE AND HE IS YOU AND ALL AROUND YOU HIS PHOTOGRAPHS ARE THERE, ONLY HIS NAME IS IN YOUR MIND, ALL THE TIME HIS SATSANGS ARE GOING ON AND HIS MUSIC IS PLAYING, AND YOU HAVE A NEW JATA GETTING DONE FOR YOU, AND FROM YOUR HEAD TO TOE, YOUR HAIRSTYLE, LIFESTYLE, EVERYTHING HAS CHANGED! YOU FEEL INTENSELY BLESSED AND BLISSED! ALL THE TIME YOU KNOW YOU ARE WIDELY SMILING! YOU LAUGH AND TALK ON YOUR OWN! PEOPLE CAN'T TOLERATE THAT YOU ARE HAPPY ON YOUR OWN. IF YOU ARE SAD ON YOUR OWN, THEY ARE OK, BUT WHEN YOU LAUGH ON YOUR OWN, YOU ARE MAKING A STATEMENT THAT YOU DON'T NEED THEM FOR YOUR HAPPINESS, AND THEY CANT TOLERATE IT! IF HUSBAND OR WIFE ARE HAPPY ON THEIR OWN, THE OTHER CANT TOLERATE! THEY WILL THINK, ‘WHAT FOR I AM HERE?!’ 

*HINDUISM IS THE LIVING RELIGION BECAUSE IT IS KEPT ALIVE CONTINUOUSLY BY INCARNATIONS. AGAIN AND AGAIN, NOT ONLY PARAMASHIVA BUT EVEN OTHER GODS MANIFEST AS INCARNATIONS ON PLANET EARTH. WITHOUT ANY SECOND THOUGHT I CAN NAME SHIRDI SAI BABA AND PUTTAPARTHI SAI BABA AS MODERN DAY  INCARNATIONS WHO MANIFESTED ON PLANET EARTH. IF I HAVE TO NAME LIVING INCARNATIONS, I WILL NAME SHRI GANAPATI SACHITANANDA SWAMI OF MYSORE DATTAPEETHAM, AS AN INCARNATION OF DATTATREYA.
